flawed_nl_solution:
If Evan had 200 books two years ago, he currently has 200-40 = <<200-40=610>>610 books.
In five years, Evan will have 60 more than 610*5 = 3050 books which is the number he has now.
This means Evan will have 3050+60 = <<3050+60=3110>>3110 books in five years.
#### 3110

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160, not 610. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
